description: The background of justices typically includes some combination of an Ivy League education, a Supreme Court clerkship and a federal judgeship.
title: Kavanaugh Followed the Narrow, Elite Path of Supreme Court Justices
title_page: Kavanaugh Followed the Narrow, Elite Path of Supreme Court Justices - The New York Times
text:
